description: A colorful bright-on-black color scheme for Sublime Text  and TextMate. Its aim is to make as many languages as possible look as good as possible. Includes extended support for Python, Ruby, Clojure, JavaScript/JSON, C/C++, diff, HTML/XML, Markdown, reStructuredText, PHP, CSS/SCSS/SASS, GitGutter, Find In Files, PackageDev, Regex, and SublimeLinter.
